item.title: Python3 relearning notebook [1]
item.description: Generator g = (x*x for x in range(1,10)) next(g) 1 for i in g: print(i) 4 9 16 25 36 49 64 81 def fib(max): n,a,b = 0,0,1 while(n<max): yield b a,b = b, a+b n = n+1 return 'done' f = fib(6) for i in f: print(i) 1 1 2 3 5 8 %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np x = np.arange(20) y = x**2

item.title: Data Mining - Learn Pandas
item.description: import pandas as pd from pandas.io.parsers import read_csv !ls gender_submission.csv preData.ipynb train.csv ipython_log.py test.csv train_data = read_csv("train.csv") test_date = read_csv("test.csv") #print(train_data) train_data.sample(2) .dataframe thead tr:only-child th { text-align: right; } .dataframe thead th { text-align: left; } .dataframe tbody tr th { vertical-align: top; } PassengerId Survived Pclass Name Sex Age SibSp Parch Ticket Fare Cabin Embarked 286 287 1 3 de Mulder, Mr.

item.title: MacOS Terminal Proxy with Shadowsocks
item.description: Because of some regulations, it becomes more and more difficult to visit with abroad sites in China. The throughput with abroad IP is limited within a very low level, which is nearly unusable. Accordingly, I got some connect errors when I use some tools such as pip and conda to install packages. To solve this problem, I started to think whether I can use Shadowsocks as proxy for my Terminal. And luckily, I find some informing tutorials from Google.

item.title: Python3 ReLearning Notebook 1
item.description: #1. Code of String ASCII: use 8 bit to represent 256 characters including numbers, letters and punctuations. Unicode: usually use 2 bytes to represent all of the characters including letters from various languages. uft-8: 8-bit Unicode Transformation Format. A character in UTF8 can be from 1 to 4 bytes long. UTF-8 can represent any character in the Unicode standard. UTF-8 is backwards compatible with ASCII. #2. .encode() & .decode.() bytes

item.title: Retrospect and Prospect in 2017
item.description: 最近老妈赴京照顾姐姐和小外甥女，我跟我奶奶投奔到了姑妈家。姑妈家在一个村子里，姑妈家永远干净整洁，走上将近一米高的台阶才能进门，一进门就是水

item.title: jekyll初体验
item.description: 缘由 我在debug的过程中遇到了各种问题，当我对错误信息进行搜索时，总是会在一些个人blog上得到巧妙的解答，这让我感觉blog不仅是记录自
